00026 #include "OgreRenderQueue.h"
00027 
00028 #include "OgreRenderable.h"
00029 #include "OgreMaterial.h"
00030 
00031 namespace Ogre {
00032     bool RenderQueue::queueItemLess::operator() (const Material* x, const Material* y) const
00033     {
00034         // If x transparent and y not, x > y (since x has to overlap y)
00035         if (x->isTransparent() && !y->isTransparent())
00036         {
00037             return false;
00038         }
00039         // If y is transparent and x not, x < y
00040         else if (!x->isTransparent() && y->isTransparent())
00041         {
00042             return true;
00043         }
00044         else
00045         {
00046             // Otherwise don't care (both transparent or both solid)
00047             // Just arbitrarily use pointer
00048             return x < y;
00049         }
00050 
00051     }
00052     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00053     void RenderQueue::addRenderable(Renderable* pRend)
00054     {
00055         Material* m = pRend->getMaterial();
00056         // Find material (if exists in map)
00057         std::pair<RenderQueueMap::iterator, bool> insRet;
00058         /*
00059         RenderQueueMap::iterator i = mQueue.find(m);
00060         if (i = mQueue.end())
00061         {
00062             // Not there yet, insert new material entry
00063             i = mQueue.insert(RenderQueueMap::value_type(m, newVec));
00064         }
00065         */
00066         std::vector<Renderable*> newVec;
00067         insRet = mQueue.insert(RenderQueueMap::value_type(m, newVec));
00068         // Insert new Renderable
00069         insRet.first->second.push_back(pRend);
00070     }
00071     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     void RenderQueue::clear(void)
00073     {
00074         mQueue.clear();
00075     }
00076 }
